thread.title: Kyvos Insights To Showcase Big Data Analytics Solution at 2
thread.title_full: Kyvos Insights To Showcase Big Data Analytics Solution at 2

author: Kyvos Insights
title: Kyvos Insights To Showcase Big Data Analytics Solution at 2
text:
LOS GATOS, Calif. , Sept. 22,   Kyvos Insights, a big data analytics company , today announced that it will be exhibiting and demonstrating its Kyvos solution at booth number 316 at Strata + Hadoop World in New York City , Sept. 29-Oct. 1, 2015 . Recently launched in June , Kyvos is a comprehensive online analytical processing (OLAP) solution for Hadoop. Kyvos requires no programming, delivers unmatched scalability and empowers business users to easily and quickly derive powerful insights from their data to make better, more informed decisions.
Details of Kyvos Insights' participation at the conference are as follows:  
What: 
Kyvos Insights vice president of products, Ajay Anand, will demonstrate how Kyvos enables businesses to convert raw data into insights, leading to more meaningful customer understanding, targeted marketing, efficient operations and increased profitability.  
Where:  
The conference is being held at the Javits Center in New York, NY. The company will be exhibiting at booth number 316. 
When:   
Product demos will take place at the Kyvos Insights booth during show floor hours from Sept. 29-Oct. 1, 2015. 
Information:  
For more information about Strata + Hadoop World, visit: http://strataconf.com/big-data-conference-ny-2015 . 

To book a meeting with the company and learn more about the benefits of Kyvos, please visit: http://www.kyvosinsights.com/strata-hadoop-world . 
Members of the media and analyst communities interested in speaking with Kyvos Insights at the conference should contact kyvos@daviesmurphy.com . 
About Kyvos Insights 
Kyvos Insights is committed to unlocking the power of big data analytics with its unique "OLAP on Hadoop" technology. Backed by years of analytics expertise and a passion for big data, the company aims to revolutionize big data analytics by providing business users with the ability to visualize, explore and analyze big data interactively, working directly on Hadoop. Headquartered in Los Gatos, California , Kyvos Insights was formed by a team of veterans from Yahoo!, Impetus and Intellicus Technologies in 2014. For more information, visit: www.kyvosinsights.com or connect with us on Twitter @kyvosinsights and LinkedIn at: http://linkd.in/1Fg3lNr .
